AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.United States-Mexican border: geographical boundary relevant to the case and the Brignoni-Ponce test, with Interstate 35 being a common route leading to it, patrolled by agents like Stanley Pruszenski and Alfred Baron
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.pickup truck: vehicle stopped on an Interstate Highway in Texas, containing a heavily loaded camper attachment, with occupants attempting to evade detection, searched by border patrol agents Stanley Pruszenski and Alfred Baron
